text: "Never" is a 1985 song by American hard rock band Heart and is the second single from their eighth studio album Heart. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 13 in Canada, number 20 in Finland and number 48 in Australia. In 1988 it went to number 8 in the United Kingdom and number 10 in Ireland. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heart (band) songs
title: Never (Heart song)
